author: wn.com
title: New education and training partnership for TV and film (University of York)
text: ( Source : University of York ) Posted on 21 October 2015 We are pleased to announce that we are working with the China Culture Investment Group (CCIG) to develop new education and industrial training provision aimed at overseas students,
